verses.verse: The <S%G602>Revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to him, to <S%G1166>show<s%> to his <S%G1401>servants<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1722>shortly<s%> <S%G5034><s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass; and he <S%G649>sent<s%> and <S%G4591>signified<s%> it by his <S%G32>angel<s%> to his <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2491>John:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>record<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and of the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and of <S%G3745>all<s%> things that he <S%G1492>saw.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%G314>reads,<s%> and they that <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> and <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>therein:<s%> <S%G846><s%> for the <S%G2540>time<s%> is at <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

<S%G2491>John<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in <S%G773>Asia:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from him <S%G3588>which<s%> is, and <S%G3588>which<s%> was, and <S%G3588>which<s%> is to <S%G2064>come;<s%> and from the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G1799>before<s%> his <S%G2362>throne;<s%>

And from <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who is the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3144>witness,<s%> and the <S%G4416>first<s%> <S%G4416>begotten<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> To him that <S%G25>loved<s%> us, and <S%G3068>washed<s%> us from our <S%G266>sins<s%> in his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%>

And has <S%G4160>made<s%> us <S%G935>kings<s%> and <S%G2409>priests<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> and his <S%G3962>Father;<s%> to him be <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G2904>dominion<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> with <S%G3507>clouds;<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> him, and they also <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1574>pierced<s%> him: and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5443>kindreds<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2875>wail<s%> <S%G1909>because<s%> of him. <S%G3483>Even<s%> <S%G3483>so,<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1>Alpha<s%> and <S%G5598>Omega,<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> and the ending <S%G5056>,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is, and <S%G3588>which<s%> was, and <S%G3588>which<s%> is to <S%G2064>come,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>

I <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> am <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> and <S%G4791>companion<s%> in <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> and in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> and <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> was in the <S%G3520>isle<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3963>Patmos,<s%> for the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and for the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I was in the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G2960>Lord's<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> me a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> as of a <S%G4536>trumpet,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1>Alpha<s%> and <S%G5598>Omega,<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> and the <S%G2078>last:<s%> and, <S%G3739>What<s%> you <S%G991>see,<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> in a <S%G975>book,<s%> and send <S%G3992><s%> it to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in <S%G773>Asia;<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> and to <S%G4667>Smyrna,<s%> and to <S%G4010>Pergamos,<s%> and to <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> and to <S%G4554>Sardis,<s%> and to <S%G5359>Philadelphia,<s%> and to Laodicea. <S%G2993><s%>

And I <S%G1994>turned<s%> to <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> that <S%G2980>spoke<s%> with me. And being <S%G1994>turned,<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks;<s%>

And in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks<s%> one <S%G3664>like<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with a <S%G4158>garment<s%> down to the <S%G4158>foot,<s%> and <S%G4024>girt<s%> <S%G4024>about<s%> the <S%G3149>breasts<s%> with a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2223>girdle.<s%>

His <S%G2776>head<s%> and his <S%G2359>hairs<s%> were <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> <S%G2053>wool,<s%> as <S%G3022>white<s%> as <S%G5510>snow;<s%> and his <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were as a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire;<s%>

And his <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to fine <S%G5474>brass,<s%> as if they <S%G4448>burned<s%> in a <S%G2575>furnace;<s%> and his <S%G5456>voice<s%> as the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

And he <S%G2192>had<s%> in his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars:<s%> and out of his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1607>went<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> two <S%G1366>edged<s%> <S%G4501>sword:<s%> and his <S%G3799>countenance<s%> was as the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G5316>shines<s%> in his <S%G1411>strength.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, I <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> his <S%G4228>feet<s%> as <S%G3498>dead.<s%> And he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> on me, <S%G3004>saying<s%> to me, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> not; I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> and the last: <S%G2078><s%>

I <S%G1510>am<s%> he that <S%G2198>lives,<s%> and was <S%G3498>dead;<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> for ever more, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen;<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of <S%G86>hell<s%> and of death. <S%G2288><s%>
<S%G1125>Write<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1492>seen,<s%> and the things <S%G3739>which<s%> are, and the things <S%G3739>which<s%> shall be hereafter; <S%G3326><s%>

The <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> in my <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, and the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks.<s%> The <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> are the <S%G32>angels<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches:<s%> and the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> are the <S%G2033>seven<s%> churches. <S%G1577><s%>
